name: Keyboard Kingdom
description:
Keyboard Kingdom is a mix between an educational typing game and a city builder. Besides the button to start the game, the game is all controlled by typing words. Underline words in the world will perform an action, such as gathering a resource or constructing a building. The game is over when you complete the castle, and you will be scored on time and words per minute. Let me know how you did!

The game was made in Unity, using TextMeshPro, ProBuilder, and Polybrush. (Which are all put out as free assets by unity themselves. I highly recommend them!) Music is procedural generated by Wolfram Tones, which is always fun to use.

This was a solo project, though models were created by me, a few of the textures and the sound effects are not created by me.
